survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Augmented Reality Shopping Experiences Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on consumer attitudes and preferences towards augmented reality (AR) features in online shopping platforms.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with augmented reality (AR) features in online shopping platforms?
answer_options: Very familiar - I use them regularly
Somewhat familiar - I’ve tried them a few times
Not very familiar - I’ve heard of them but haven’t used them
Not at all familiar - I don’t know what they are
questions.routing_logic: This question appears to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to measure familiarity. Ensure the options are mutually exclusive.

questions.question_text: Which of the following AR shopping features have you used? (Select all that apply)

AR furniture placement in your home
AR makeup or beauty product testing
AR product visualization (e.g., seeing a 3D model of a product)
None of the above
